scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es && rollup -c && copyfiles -f src/notification.html ./build/dist
scripts.build:es: rimraf build/es && tsc -p tsconfig.json -m ES2015 --outdir ./build/es && copyfiles -f src/notification.html ./build/es
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf build/lib && tsc -p tsconfig.json -m CommonJS --outdir ./build/lib && copyfiles -f src/notification.html ./build/lib
scripts.build:umd: rimraf build/dist && npm run build:es && rollup -c && copyfiles -f src/notification.html ./build/dist
